name: Nature Resistance Totem
rules: Ongoing: When this card enters play, it deals 2 nature damage to target hero or ally. Other friendly heroes and allies have Nature Resistance. (Prevent all nature ([Nature]) damage that would be dealt to them.);(Totems can't attack.)

name: Aggressive Exploitation
rules: Your hero deals 4 melee damage to target exhausted hero or ally.
flavour: Dud you really expect me to fight fair? - Vorix Zorbuzz

name: Ancestral Purge
rules: Destroy target ability that's not attached to a friendly card. If you do, your hero deals 1 nature damage to each opposing hero and ally.
flavour: The spirits warned me of your corruption. - Malaxia Wizwhirl

name: Aspect of the Wild
rules: Ongoing: [Nature] allies you control have +2 / +2.;2 -> Target ally you control has Nature Resistance this turn.
flavour: Every soul has a wild aspect; you must find yours and embrace it. - The Greatest Race of Hunters

name: Avatar of the Wild
rules: Put an X [Melee] / X [Health] Tiger ally token into play with Ferocity.
flavour: Rise, great hunter, and feast! - Amaria Kelsur

name: Black Blood
rules: Your hero deals 5 shadow damage to target ally. If you control a Disease, your hero also deals 5 shadow damage to target hero.

name: Blast Trap
rules: Trap (You may exhaust your defending hero rather than pay this card's cost.) Destroy target attacking ally with cost 4 or more.

name: Blessing of Defense
rules: Attach to target ally.;Ongoing: Attached ally has +5 ATK while defending.
flavour: Those who take up arms against me will find that my faith provides more then just a shield. - Jaenel

name: Blessing of the Kindred
rules: As this ability enters play, name a class.;Ongoing: Friendly allies of that class have +1 / +1.;(received errata)
flavour: Wa are all brothers and sisters in the eyes of the Light. - Jaenal

name: Blessing of Virtue
rules: Attach to target ally.;Ongoing: Attached ally has +2 / +2, and damage that it would deal is unpreventable. ;;Stash: (As this enters your resource row, you may have it enter face up. Immediately turn it face down.) Damage that allies you control would deal is unpreventable this turn.

name: Blood Chill
rules: Attach to target hero.;Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 frost damage to attached hero. If damage is dealt this way, exhaust each opposing hero or ally with Protector.

name: Breath of the Elements
rules: Ready each ally you control.
flavour: Feel the surging elements invigorate your mind, bodym and soul. - Malaxia Wizwhirl

name: Bully
rules: Destroy target ally or equipment with cost 4 or less.
flavour: Your back seems as good a place to sheath my blade as any. - Vorix Zorbuzz

name: Censure
rules: Put target opposing attacking ally into its owner's hand.
flavour: Anyone so easily dismissed is unworthy of defeat at my hands. - Rekwa Proudhorn

name: Chains of Ice
rules: Attach to target opposing ally. Search your deck for a Disease, reveal it, and put it into your hand.;Ongoing: Attached ally can't attack.

name: Chaotic Rush
rules: Put target ally on top of its owner's deck.;Ongoing: Opposing allies enter play exhausted.
flavour: You are clearly unprepared for what lies ahead. - Jai Dawnsteel

name: Contagious Poison
rules: Attach to target hero or ally that was dealt combat damage by your hero this turn.;Ongoing: At the start of your turn, you may reattach this ability to target hero or ally. Then, your hero deals 2 nature damage to attached character.

name: Crushing Strike
rules: Destroy target opposing equipment. If you do, your hero may deal 3 melee damage to its controller's hero.
flavour: Armor can do only so much. - Peter Hottelet

name: Dancing Rune Weapon
rules: Blood Hero Required; Put a weapon with cost less than or equal to the number of resources you control from your hand into play. At the end of this turn, put that weapon from play into your hand.

name: Dark Extortion
rules: Target player chooses an ally he controls. Gain control of that ally.
flavour: What a shame your will was not as strong as your body. Now they both belong to me. - Tilly Fiddlelight

name: Daze
rules: Look at target player's hand and choose a card. He discards that card. ;;Stash (As this enters your resource row, you may have it enter face up. Immediately turn it face down.): Look at target player's hand.

name: Defender's Vigil
rules: This turn, target hero or ally must attack if able, can attack only your hero if able, and has -3 ATK while attacking your hero.
flavour: Rest easy, friend. You are under my watch now. - Jai Dawnsteel

name: Demonic Reclamation
rules: As an additional cost to play this ability, destroy an ally you control.;Draw two cards.;;Stash: Shuffle target ally in your graveyard into your deck.

name: Demonic Soulstone
rules: Attach to target ally you control.;Ongoing: When attached ally is destroyed, put it from its owner's graveyard into his hand.
flavour: You're done when I say you're done. - Victor Baltus

name: Detect Prey
rules: Allies you control have Long-Range while in combat with target hero or ally this turn. ;;Stash (As this enters your resource row, you may have it enter face up. Immediately turn it face down.): Your hero has Long-Range this turn.

name: Divine Cleansing
rules: Destroy any number of abilities attached to friendly cards.
flavour: Those who possess true purity of mind and body are capable of turning it outward. - Rekwa Proudhorn

name: Divine Fury
rules: Holy Hero Required; Your hero deals 5 unpreventable holy damage to target hero or ally and heals 5 damage from target hero or ally.

name: Divine Hymn
rules: Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero heals 2 damage from each hero and ally you control. At the end of your turn, destroy this ability if you don't control an ally.
flavour: As long as one voice is left to lift in prayer, the song will never fade. - Yuna Sunridge

name: Draining Poison
rules: Attach to target hero or ally that was dealt combat damage by your hero this turn.;Ongoing: At the start of your turn, attached character's controller discards a card.

name: Earth and Moon
rules: Balance Hero Required; Ongoing: If a hero or ally you control would deal arcane ([Arcane]) or nature ([Nature]) damage, it deals that much +2 instead.

name: Earthen Blast
rules: Your hero deals 4 nature damage to target ally. ;;Stash (As this enters your resource row, you may have it enter face up. Immediately turn it face down.): Your hero deals 2 nature damage to target hero.

name: Earthen Embrace
rules: Attach to target ally, and your hero heals all damage from it. Ongoing: Attached ally has +2 ATK.
flavour: It is a blessing to be able to stand in the presence of Therazane. - Malaxia Wizwhirl

name: Elemental Vision
rules: Look at the top three cards of your deck. Put one into your hand and the rest into your graveyard.
flavour: Commune with the elements, and you may gain sight beyound sight. - Bragvi Stormstein

name: Enduring Winter
rules: Frost Hero Required; Attach to target ability or equipment.;Ongoing: Attached card can't be destroyed.
flavour: If I had things my way, the winter would last forever. - Suvok Frozeneye

name: Entangling Growth
rules: Attach to target opposing ally and exhaust it.; Ongoing: Attached ally can't ready during its controller's ready step.
flavour: Da roots will only grow tighter, mon. - Jumo'zin

name: Excessive Force
rules: Target ally has +3 ATK this turn. Target ally has -3 ATK this turn.
flavour: There's dead, and then there's really dead. - Caleb Pavish

name: Execute
rules: Destroy target ally with damage on it.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Class Starter Deck 2010,Champion Decks
flavour: I will give you but a moment to make peace with this world. - Peter Hottelet

name: Extinguish
rules: Ongoing: When this ability enters play, you may interrupt target ability. If your hero would be dealt magical damage (Arcane ([Arcane]), Fire ([Fire]), Frost ([Frost]), Holy ([Holy]), Nature ([Nature]), or Shadow ([Shadow])), prevent 1 of it.

name: Faerie Fire
rules: Attach to target hero or ally.; Ongoing: Attached character loses and can't have Stealth.; If attached character would be dealt damage, it's dealt that much +1 instead.

name: Fear
rules: Put target opposing ally into its owner's hand.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2010
flavour: The screams of dread that escape your mouth are intoxicating. - Victor Baltus

name: Fel Blaze
rules: Your hero deals 2 fire damage to each non-Demon hero and ally.
flavour: These unholy alliances are not without their rewards. - Victor Baltus

name: Fire Blast
rules: Your hero deals 2 fire damage to target hero or ally.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Assault on Icecrown Citadel,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Class Starter Deck 2010,Archive

name: Flare
rules: Opposing heroes and allies lose and can't have Elusive, Stealth, and Untargetable this turn.
flavour: Avoid the light at all costs! - Vorix Zorbuzz

name: Flash Heal
rules: Your hero heals 4 damage from target hero or ally.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Class Starter Deck 2010
flavour: It will take all we have to heal those who fell victim to the destruction caused by Deathwing. - Tilly Fiddlelight.

name: Flourish
rules: Reveal the top card of your deck. You may place it into your resource row exhausted as an additional resource. ;;Stash (As this enters your resource row, you may have it enter face up. Immediately turn it face down.): Your hero heals 2 damage from itself.

name: Frenzy
rules: Ongoing: [Exhaust] -> Target ally you control has Assault 1 this turn. (It has +1 ATK on your turn.)
flavour: How little it takes to incite anger. - Highlord Darion Mograine

name: Frost Wave
rules: Up to two target allies can't attack or exhaust this turn. Draw a card.
flavour: Stay where you are! - Suvok Frozeneye

name: Frostfire Bolt
rules: Your hero deals 2 unpreventable frostfire damage to target ally. This turn, an ally dealt damage this way can't attack or exhaust, and loses and can't have powers. (Frostfire damage counts as both frost and fire.)
flavour: Fire so hot it numbs, and frost so cold it burns. - Suvok Frozeneye

name: Frozen Nerves
rules: Attach to target non-hero card.;Ongoing: Attached card can't attack or exhaust.
flavour: Looks like you won't be going anywhere for a while. - Kadus Frosthand

name: Gouge
rules: Exhaust target hero or ally. It can't ready during its controller's next ready step.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Class Starter Deck 2010
flavour: Study your intended victim and then exploit his weaknesses for maximum effectiveness. - Caleb Pavish

name: Grip of the Damned
rules: Put target opposing ally or weapon on the bottom of its owner's deck.
flavour: Terrifying, isn't it? - Ayaka Winterhoof

name: Heroic Impulse
rules: Attach to target hero or ally you control.;Ongoing: Attached character has Protector. (It may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.)
flavour: Quickly, get behind me! - Jai Dawnsteel

name: Holy Light
rules: Your hero heals 5 damage from target hero or ally. Draw a card.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Assault on Icecrown Citadel,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Class Starter Deck 2010

name: Incapacitate
rules: Attach to target resource.;Ongoing: Attached resource can't ready.
flavour: One well-placed blow can be more crippling than a hundred random strikes. - Caleb Pavish

name: Juggernaut
rules: Arms Hero Required; Exhaust all opposing heroes and allies. Your hero has Assault 3 this turn.
flavour: Now you die! - Gorebelly

name: Lightning Bolt
rules: Your hero deals 4 nature damage to target hero or ally.
reprinted: Heroes of Azeroth,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Class Starter Deck 2010

name: Mana Diamond
rules: Ongoing: At the start of your turn, add a mana counter to this ability. Then, you may destroy this ability. If you do, draw a card for each mana counter.
flavour: If you stare too deeply, you may find yourself lost forever, lad - Kadus Frosthand

name: Mana Shift
rules: Gain control of any number of opposing abilities with combined cost less than or equal to the number of resources you control. For each of those abilities that's attached, you may reattach it.

name: Mark of the Untamed
rules: Attach to target ally. ;Ongoing: Attached ally has +1 / +1 and Nature Resistance. (Prevent all nature ([Nature]) damage that would be dealt to it.)
flavour: Become one with nature, mon. - Jumo'zin

name: Muddle
rules: Ongoing: When this ability enters play, you may put target opposing ability into its owner's hand. Opponents pay 1 more to play abilities.
flavour: Your voice has fallen on deaf ears. - Grizlik Sparkhex

name: Nature's Fury
rules: Your hero deals X nature damage to target hero or ally, where X is the highest ATK among [Nature] cards you control.
flavour: Your presence here is a problem that demands a swift solution. - Arturius Hathrow

name: Nether Inversion
rules: Target ally has +3 / -3 this turn.
flavour: There is always a price to pay. - Grizlik Sparkhex

name: Onslaught
rules: Destroy all equipment.
flavour: It's time for a fair fight. - Jai Dawnsteel

name: Oppress
rules: Destroy target ability. If you do, its controller discards a card.
flavour: You rely far too much on your tricks. - Yuna Sunridge

name: Path of Frost
rules: Put target ally from your graveyard on top of your deck.
flavour: For Magni's sake, how do you get away from these lads? - Bragvi Stormstein

name: Power Word: Preservation
rules: Attach to target ally.;Ongoing: Attached ally has -3 / +3.
flavour: Survival is oftentimes key to victory. - Tilly Fiddlelight

name: Power Word: Shelter
rules: Attach to target ally.;Ongoing: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to attached ally. At end of turn, destroy this ability.

name: Psychic Wail
rules: Target player puts an ally he controls into its owner's hand. ;;Stash (As this enters your resource row, you may have it enter face up. Immediately turn it face down.): Exhaust target resource.

name: Raging Shout
rules: Ongoing: Allies you control have Assault 1. ;;Stash (As this enters your resource row, you may have it enter face up. Immediately turn it face down.): Your hero has Assault 1 this turn.

name: Reawakening
rules: Put any number of [Nature] allies from your graveyard into your resource row face down and exhausted.
flavour: The children of summer are reborn in my wake. - Arturius Hathrow

name: Rejuvenation
rules: Attach to target hero.;Ongoing: Attached hero has Mend 2. (At the start of your turn, it may heal 2 damage from target hero or ally.)
flavour: The breath of life will reel you back from the edge of oblivion. - Arturius Hathrow

name: Repentance
rules: Retribution Hero Required; Destroy target ability, ally, or equipment that damage was dealt with or dealt by this turn.
flavour: Allow me to show you the proper way to atone for your actions. - Rekwa Proudhorn

name: Ripple
rules: Your hero deals 1 arcane damage to each opposing hero and ally. ;;Stash (As this enters your resource row, you may have it enter face up. Immediately turn it face down.): The next time your hero would deal damage with an ability this turn, it deals that much +1 instead.

name: Rocket Barrage
rules: Ongoing: [Exhaust] -> When target Goblin Ally you control exhausts this turn, you may pay 1. If you do, it deals 1 fire damage to target ally.
flavour: Fire in the hole! - Vorix Zorbuzz

name: Rolling Thunder
rules: Elemental Hero Required; Your hero deals nature damage to target hero or ally equal to 3 plus an additional 3 for each equipment in that character's party.

name: Sacred Shield
rules: Interrupt target ability that is targeting a friendly card.
flavour: You will find that the Light protects not only my life, but yours as well. - Jaenel

name: Savage Bear Form
rules: Ongoing: Your hero has Protector and a +5 [Health]. (It may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.)
flavour: Even the most serene of druids may have a restless beast cagad within. - Arturius Hathrow

name: Seal Fate
rules: Assassination Hero Required; As an additional cost to play this ability, put the top five cards of your deck into your graveyard. Your hero deals melee damage to target hero or ally equal to the number of [Rogue] abilities put into your graveyard this way.

name: Seal of Wrath
rules: Ongoing: When your hero deals combat damage with a weapon, it may also deals 2 unpreventable holy damage to target hero or ally.
flavour: Judgement comes for those who harm the innocent. - Rekwa Proudhorn

name: Searing Pain
rules: Your hero deals 2 fire damage to target hero or ally, plus an additional 2 for each [Fire] card you control.
flavour: Even those born of the Firelands will burn in a fel inferno. - Grizlik Sparkhex

name: Seeping Shadows
rules: Attach to target hero.;Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 2 shadow damage to attached hero. Its controller puts a card from the top of his deck into his graveyard for each damage dealt this way.

name: Spiritual Harmony
rules: Put target ally from your graveyard into your hand. If you do, your hero heals damage from itself equal to that ally's cost.
flavour: The divine power that flows through me when I raise a fallen ally restores me as much as it does him. - Yuna Sunridge

name: Spiritual Return
rules: Put target [Fire], [Frost], or [Nature] ally from your graveyard into play if its cost is less than or equal to the number of resources you control. That ally enters play with damage equal to its [Health] -1.

name: Stance Mastery
rules: Ongoing: [Exhaust] -> Your hero has +1 ATK this combat.
flavour: There is no difference between offense and defense. - Peter Hottelet

name: Stasis
rules: Attach to target equipment and exhaust it.;Ongoing: Attached equipment can't ready during its controller's ready step.
flavour: Let no weapon be lifted for a purpose that is not righteous. - Jaenel

name: Steady Shot
rules: Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero may deal 1 ranged damage to target hero or ally.
reprinted: Assault on Icecrown Citadel,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Champion Decks
flavour: Draw... inhale... exhale... release. - Amaria Kelsur

name: Steal Steel
rules: As an additional cost to play this ability, remove up to five [Rogue] abilities in your graveyard from the game. Search target opponent's deck for an equipment with cost less than or equal to the number of cards removed this way and put it into play under your control.

name: Strangulate
rules: Interrupt target ability. ;;Stash (As this enters your resource row, you may have it enter face up. Immediately turn it face down.): Opponent's can't play abilities this turn.

name: Summoning Portal
rules: Search your deck for an ally, reveal it, and put it into your hand
flavour: Now is not the time to be shy. - Victor Baltus

name: Thunderous Challenge
rules: Your hero deals 2 melee damage to each opposing hero and ally. A character dealt damage this way has -2 ATK this turn.
flavour: His roar could make even the mightiest of dragons jealous. - Bragvi Stormstein

name: Thunderstrike Weapon
rules: Attach to target equipment you control.;Ongoing: When attached equipment exhausts, you may pay 1. If you do, your hero deals 1 nature damage to target hero or ally.

name: Track Dragonkin
rules: Target ally has -2 ATK this turn, or -4 ATK if it's a Dragonkin.
flavour: Any hunter worth his salt has matched wits with a dragon at some time in his life. - The Greatest Race of Hunters

name: Unholy Ground
rules: Ongoing: When a non-token ally you control is destroyed, put a 3 [Melee] / 3 [Health] Ghoul ally token into play.
flavour: You had better double your efforts. - Haedis

name: Unstable Infusion
rules: Your hero deals arcane damage to target hero or ally equal to the cost of an equipment in that character's party.
flavour: It's gonna blow! - Bragvi Stormstein

name: Viciousness
rules: Ongoing: 1, [Exhaust] -> Target Worgen ally you control has Ferocity this turn.
flavour: There will be nothing left but scraps for the dogs. - Victor Baltus

name: Vigil of the Light
rules: Put target ally from your graveyard into play. If you do, attach this ability to it.;Ongoing: At the start of each turn, your hero heals all damage from attached ally.
flavour: We put our faith in that which both sustains and restores. - Jaenel

name: Wing Clip
rules: Target hero or ally can't attack your hero this turn. Your hero deals 1 melee damage to it.
flavour: There is only so much flesh to wound.

name: Withering Decay
rules: Attach to target hero.;Ongoing: At the start of your turn, your hero deals 1 shadow damage to attached hero. On your turn, allies in attached hero's party have -1 [Health].

name: Wrath
rules: Your hero deals 3 nature damage to target hero or ally.
reprinted: Through the Dark Portal,Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Class Starter Deck 2010,Archive
flavour: Dis new world gonna take some gettin' used to, bruddah. - Jumo'zin

name: Wyvern Sting
rules: Survival Hero Required; Attach to target ally, or target hero or ally if you control a Ranged weapon.;Ongoing: Attached character can't attack or exhaust unless its controller pays 2.

name: Adrienne the Inspiring
rules: 4 -> Target ally has Assault 4 this turn. (It has +4 ATK on your turn.)
flavour: Her indomitable spirit and selflessness rally everyone around her.

name: Aileen the Thunderblessed
rules: 1, Exhaust a [Nature] card you control -> This ally deals nature damage to target hero or ally equal to that [Nature] card's ATK.
flavour: The Shattering has left the elements in desarray, and it is shaman who must help return them to order.

name: Alador Stonebrew
rules: Protector (This ally may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.)
flavour: Times are tough, lad, but I'll always have yer back.

name: Alister Cooper
rules: Aberration (Prevent all non-combat damage that would be dealt to this ally.); Ferocity (This ally can attack immediately.)
flavour: The Banshee Queen and her Forsaken will be burned to dust and ash!

name: Andrew Ulric
rules: Aberration (Prevent all non-combat damage that would be dealt to this ally.)
flavour: There are those of us who stun our curse, but I am not one of them.

name: Aresha Thorncaller
rules: Protector;This ally has Nature Resistance while you control another ally.
flavour: The return of Ysera has made the allure of nature stronger than ever.

name: Arisa Sarum
rules: Protector (This ally may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.) Opponent's can't place quests face up.
flavour: You have tried my patience long enough.

name: Bayner Cogbertson
flavour: The focus of the Alliance has been divided as of late, but we must keep a watchful eye of the Horde and their new Warchief.

name: Bella Wilder
rules: This ally has Ferocity while you control another [Nature] card.

name: Boki Earthgaze
rules: Ferocity (This ally can attack immediately.)
flavour: Garrosh may be Warchief, but Thrall has done more than enough to earn my loyalty.

name: Boomer
rules: Once on each of your turns: Emit a sonic blast -> Exhaust target hero or ally. This ally deals 1 nature damage to it.
flavour: Skreeee!

name: Cadon Thundershade
rules: When this ally enters play, you may put target ability into its owner's hand.
flavour: You may want to rethink that plan.

name: Cairne, Earthmother's Chosen
rules: Tauren heroes and allies you control have Warstomp. (When they attack or defend, you may exhaust target hero or ally.);;Stash: Put a 1 [Nature] / 1 [Health] [Horde] Tauren Warrior ally token into play.

name: Ceraka
rules: On your turn: 1, Turn a quest you control face down -> This ally deals 3 fire damage to target hero.
flavour: Burn them to ash and let the wind take them out to sea.

name: Dorladris Spellfire
rules: 4 -> Draw a card.
flavour: I have much knowledge to pass on, if you'll give me the chance.

name: Drizzie Steelslam
rules: Protector (This ally may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.);When this ally enters play, you may put target equipment into its owner's hand.
flavour: Such shoddy craftsmanship! Clearly gnomish in nature.

name: Emerald Acidspewer
rules: When a resource you control is turned face down, you may have target player shuffle his graveyard into his deck.
flavour: The followers of Ysera often fight battles in this realms as well as in the Emerald Dream.

name: Emerald Captain
rules: When a resource you control is turned face down, this ally deals 1 nature damage to target hero.
flavour: Ysera and her green dragonflight seek to protect the World Tree from the onslaught of Ragnaros the Firelord.

name: Emerald Emissary
rules: You pay 1 less to complete quests for each Druid and Hunter you control.

name: Emerald Lifewarden
rules: You can place an additional resource on each of your turns. ;;Stash (As this enters your resource row, you may have it enter face up. Immediately turn it face down.): Reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a quest, put it into your hand.

name: Emerald Soldier
rules: When a resource you control is turned face down, this ally heals 2 damage from target hero or ally.
flavour: The matron of the green dragonflight, Ysera, is the younger sister of Alexstrasza.

name: Emerald Tree Warder
rules: When a resource you control is turned face down, you may draw a card.
flavour: The titan Eonar granted Ysera a portion of nature's influence, bound to the Emerald Dream.

name: Emerald Wanderer
rules: When a resource you control is turned face down, this ally has Assault 3 this turn.
flavour: The green dragonflight are often the most difficult flight to find in the mortal realm.

name: Eranikus
rules: At the start of your turn, reveal the top card of your deck, then place it into your resource row ready as an additional resource.
flavour: I must return to her... to protect her...

name: Exxi the Windshaper
rules: While you control another Goblin, this ally has Time is Money and [Exhaust] -> Ready another target ally.
flavour: Faster, faster, faster! I'm not paying you to sit around all day.

name: Fenton Guardmont
rules: Protector (This ally may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.);Aberration (Prevent all non-combat damage that would be dealt to this ally.)

name: Frek Snipelix
rules: Time is Money (This ally can use [Exhaust] powers immediately.);[Exhaust] -> Target ally has Long-Range this turn.

name: Furan Rookbane
rules: When this ally enters play, reveal the top card of your deck. You may place it into your resource row exhausted as an additional resource.
flavour: The Firelord seeks to veil the face Elune, hiding her with fire, smoke, and ash.

name: Garet Vice
rules: Aberration (Prevent all non-combat damage that would be dealt to this ally.)
flavour: I have little patience for the likes of you.

name: Gerana Sparkfist
rules: When this ally enters play, she deals 1 arcane damage to each opposing hero and ally.
flavour: I'll be needing a little breathing room, if ye don't mind.

name: Gispax the Mixologist
rules: Time is Money (This ally can use [Exhaust] powers immediately.) [Exhaust], Discard a card Search your deck for a [Nature] card, reveal it, and put it into your hand.
flavour: What'cha need? I've got poisons, potions, tonics, elixirs, extracts, spirits...

name: Gorz Blazefist
rules: Ferocity (This ally can attack immediately.)
flavour: Orc and fire have so very much in common.

name: Grazzle Grubhook
rules: Time is Money (This ally can use [Exhaust] powers immediately.) [Exhaust] -> Draw a card, then discard a card.
flavour: There's always time for a deal, even when the world trembles in the wake if Deathwing.

name: Guardian Steelhoof
rules: Protector (This ally may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.) This ally can't attack.
flavour: The land cries out to us for protection. Who are you to ignore her?

name: Hira
flavour: The flames dance before my fingertips like puppets dance for their master.

name: Huruk Lightvow
rules: Protector (This ally may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.)

name: Jarrod Gravon
rules: Protector (This ally may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.); 2 -> Ready this ally.
flavour: Gilneas has need of us, now more then ever.

name: Jezziki Shinebog
rules: Time is Money (This ally can use [Exhaust] powers immediately.) [Exhaust] -> This ally heals 2 damage from target hero or ally you control.
flavour: Sure, we can work something out. What do you think your life is worth?

name: Jhuunash
rules: Demonology Hero Required; Protector This ally has +1 / +1 for each resource you control.
flavour: A paltry task.

name: Jinie Swizzleshade
rules: Elusive (This ally can't be attacked.)
flavour: Let's see how the raging elements handle a heavy dose of the shadows.

name: Kalek Deepearth
rules: Mend 1 (At the start of your turn, this ally may heal 1 damage from target hero or ally.)
flavour: Let's hope what the new tribunal can lead us as well as Magni did, lad.

name: Kentro Slade
rules: At the start of your turn, if you control an armor, item, and weapon, destroy this ally. If you do, search your deck and/or hand for a master hero and put it into play.
flavour: True masters aren't born, they're made.

name: Kerzok Plixboom
rules: Long-Range Time is Money (This ally can use [Exhaust] powers immediately.) [Exhaust] -> Remove this ally from combat.
flavour: You don't survive the Lost Isles by getting yourself into trouble.

name: King Genn Greymane
rules: Aberration; This ally has +2 / +2 for each other Worgen you control.; While this ally is ready, opposing heroes and allies can't attack other Worgen you control.;(received errata)
flavour: Gilneas is its own nation, and it always will be.

name: Kirjen Fizzgar
rules: When this ally enters play, draw a card.
flavour: I've seen many troubling events in my day, lad, but the return of Deathwing trumps them all.

name: Kistix Shockvat
rules: Elusive (This ally can't be attacked.)
flavour: Don't get me wrong - I love explosives, but sometimes you just gotta work with your hands.

name: Kloxx Dedrix
rules: Time is Money (This ally can use [Exhaust] powers immediately.);[Exhaust] -> Target ally can't attack this turn.

name: Koeus
rules: When this ally enters play, if you control an ability, you may destroy target ability.

name: Korialstrasz
rules: When you play an ally, put X 1 [Fire] / 1 [Health] Red Dragonkin ally tokens into play, where X is that ally's cost.
flavour: I am your servant, now and forever, my love.

name: Laenthor Shademoon
flavour: The Highborne have been in hiding for too long. It is time for them to rejoin their brethren.

name: Landon Dunavin
rules: Long-Range
flavour: Lady Sylvanas has chosen me to take the most important of shots against our enemies.

name: Landro's Lil' XT
rules: When this ally enters play, you may destroy target item. At the start of your turn, this ally deals 1 nature damage to each hero and ally.
flavour: I guess it doesn't bend that way!

name: Loriam Argos
rules: Aberration (Prevent all non-combat damage that would be dealt to this ally.) Stealth (This ally can't be protected against.)

name: Magni, the Mountain King
rules: Protector Dwarf heroes and allies you control have additional [Health] equal to the combined [DEF] of armor you control.;;Stash: Put a 1 [Melee] / 1 [Health] [Alliance] Dwarf Warrior ally token into play.

name: Mahna Lightsky
rules: Protector;This ally has Nature Resistance on opposing turns.
flavour: Our ancestors make sure that we stay grounded first and foremost.

name: Marcus Dominar
rules: Protector (This ally may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.);Aberration (Prevent all non-combat damage that would be dealt to this ally.)
flavour: Save your tricks for other pups.

name: Marius Jator
rules: Long-Range (When this ally attacks, defenders deal no combat damage to it.) Once on each of your turns: 1 -> This ally has Assault 3 and loses and can't have Long-Range this turn.
flavour: Your attempts to avoid the inevitable are quite admirable.

name: Mottled Drake
rules: When you place a resource into your resource row face up, ready target Dragonkin ally you control. Your hero heals all damage from it. <i>(Mounts can't attack or be attacked.)

name: Nami Dabpox
rules: Elusive (This ally can't be attacked.)
flavour: It's easy to underestimate what you can't see.

name: Neboz Tombwex
rules: Protector On your turn: 5 -> Put target equipment on the bottom of its owner's deck.
flavour: At first, I feared undeath, yet so far, I have been quite pleased with the outcome.

name: Nightstalker Austen
rules: Opposing allies lose and can't have Elusive.
flavour: Adapt or perish - the first law of the wild.

name: Onnekra Bloodfang
rules: Ferocity (This ally can attack immediately.) This ally can attack only heroes.
flavour: Her single-mindedness is her greatest strength.

name: Orkahn of Orgrimmar
rules: Protector When this ally enters play, you may put target equipment from your graveyard into your hand.
flavour: If it's still sharp, it ain't broke.

name: Oruk Starstorm
flavour: The moon is always within my call.

name: Pixia Darkmist
rules: Protector (This ally may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.);Your hero has Protector.

name: Pyromancer Davins
rules: Aberration 1 -> Target friendly ally has +2 / -2 this turn. ;;Stash (As this enters your resource row, you may have it enter face up. Immediately turn it face down.): Target friendly ally has +2 / -2 this turn.

name: Rolan Phoenix
rules: Aberration;When this ally is destroyed while you control another Worgen, you may pay 1. If you do, his owner puts him from his graveyard into his hand.

name: Rosalyne von Erantor
rules: When this ally enters play, she deals 3 fire damage to your hero.
flavour: I'll help, but it'll cost you.

name: Ruby Blazewing
rules: When this or another ally enters play under your control, it may deal 1 fire damage to target ally. ;;Stash (As this enters your resource row, you may have it enter face up. Immediately turn it face down.): Your hero deals fire damage to target hero equal to the number of Dragonkin you control.

name: Ruby Emissary
rules: You pay 2 less to play Priests and Paladins, to a minimum of 1.
flavour: Alexstrasza and her dragonflight will do whatever it takes to rid Azeroth of Deathwing once and for all.

name: Ruby Enforcer
rules: Allies you control have Ferocity.
flavour: Drakonids are typically used as the primary footsoldiers for their flights.

name: Ruby Flameblade
rules: Allies you control have Assault 1.

name: Ruby Protector
rules: Allies you control have Protector.
flavour: The skill that a drokonid possesses with its polearm would amaze even the most talented warriors of Azeroth.

name: Ruby Skyrazor
rules: Allies you control have Untargetable.
flavour: This adolescent drake will one day grow to be a full-fledged dragon.

name: Ruby Stalker
rules: Allies you control have Stealth. (They can't be protected against.)
flavour: The origin of dragonspawn is unknown, but they serve their Aspects with absolute loyalty.

name: Ruon Wildhoof
rules: Mend 2 (At the start of your turn, this ally may heal 2 damage from target hero or ally.)

name: Sardok
rules: Protector;Physical Resistance (Prevent all melee ([Melee]) and ([Ranged]) damage that would be dealt to this ally.)
flavour: Born of the Twisting Nether, Sadok's corporeal form is nearly impervious to pain.

name: Sava'gin the Reckless
rules: This ally attacks opposing heroes and allies at random.;;Stash (As this enters your resource row, you may have it enter face up. Immediately turn it face down.): Your hero deals 2 nature damage to target random opposing hero or ally.

name: Savis Cindur
rules: Aberration (Prevent all non-combat damage that would be dealt to this ally.);Ferocity (This ally can attack immediately.)

name: Shanis Bladefall
rules: Protector (This ally may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.)
flavour: The Aspect of Death must soon face those who have been reborn in undeath.

name: Sura Lightningheart
rules: When this ally enters play, if you control another [Nature] card, she may deal 4 nature damage to target hero or ally.

name: Telor Sunsurge
rules: Protector (This ally may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.)
flavour: I never did enjoy toiling behind a spellbook.

name: Terina Calin
rules: When this ally enters play, if you control an equipment, you may destroy target equipment.

name: Tesla
rules: Assault 2 (This ally has +2 ATK on your turn.) Ferocity (This ally can attack immediately.)
flavour: Most wind serpents subsist on a diet of fish, but a good hunter can offer much more interesting prey.

name: Thrandis the Venomous
rules: When your hero defends, you may put two 1 [Nature] / 1 [Health] Snake ally tokens into play.
flavour: Uh, lads, methinks I found the snakes... - Grumpherys

name: Toz'jun
rules: Ferocity (This ally can attack immediately.)
flavour: Stand back, bruddah, or joo gonna get caught in da mojo.

name: Trade Prince Gallywix
rules: Goblin allies you control have Time is Money and [Exhaust] -> Ready a resource you control.
flavour: Long live the Bilgewater Cartel!

name: Traxel Emberklik
rules: Time is Money (This ally can use [Exhaust] powers immediately.) [Exhaust] -> This ally deals 1 fire damage to target hero or ally.
flavour: Fire is the best - effective, plentiful, and free.

name: Vala Carville
flavour: I've spent a lifetime studying, and now it's time to show you what I've learned.

name: Varandas Silverleaf
rules: When this ally enters play, you may turn a quest you control face down. If you do, this ally deals 3 nature damage to target ally.
flavour: It will take all we have to drive the Firelord back from Nordrassil.

name: Veline Bladestar
rules: Protector (This ally may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.)
flavour: Lower your weapons immediately. I will not warn you again.

name: Watchman Visi
rules: This ally has Assault 2 while an opposing hero is face down. (It has +2 ATK on your turn.)
flavour: Stormwind will never be safe as long as Deathwing remains in Azeroth.

name: Wazix Blonktop
rules: Untargetable
flavour: I have faith that the Light will help shield us against the onslaught of the elements.

name: Zakis Trickstab
rules: Elusive (This ally can't be attacked.) Stealth (This ally can't be protected against.)
flavour: You wanna know what's a one-sided trade? Stealing, that's what.

name: Zerzu
rules: When this ally enters play, she heals all damage from [Nature] allies you control.
flavour: Life always be shining through, mon, even in da darkest of times.

name: Zulanji
flavour: Joo have to learn to trust me, mon!

name: Zulbraka
rules: Protector (This ally may exhaust to become the defender when an opposing hero or ally attacks.)
flavour: Dis is gonna get hairy. Joo wit me?

name: Zuur
rules: When this ally enters play, you may put target [Nature] card from your graveyard into your hand.
flavour: Before it turns into mulch, allow me.

name: Abomination Knuckles
rules: When this equipment enters play, you may destroy target armor or item.
flavour: You don't want to know what I had to do to get this. - Caleb Pavish

name: Abracadaver
rules: At the start of your turn, you may put a 1 [Melee] / 1 [Health] Cadaver ally token into play with Ferocity and Protector. At the end of your turn, for each Cadaver you control, destroy it unless you pay 1.

name: Balanced Heartseeker
rules: While your hero is attacking a hero, this equipment has +2 ATK for each heirloom counter on it. ;;Stash (As this enters your resource row, you may have it enter face up. Immediately turn it face down.): Add an heirloom counter to target equipment you control.

name: Bloodied Arcanite Reaper
rules: This equipment has +3 ATK for each heirloom counter on it. ;;Stash (As this enters your resource row, you may have it enter face up. Immediately turn it face down.): Add an heirloom counter to target equipment you control.

name: Charmed Ancient Bone Bow
rules: Long-Range This equipment has +2 ATK for each heirloom counter on it. ;;Stash (As this enters your resource row, you may have it enter face up. Immediately turn it face down.): Add an heirloom counter to target equipment you control.

name: Citadel Enforcer's Claymore
flavour: Marrowgar had no idea the power that lay amongst the bones of his slain enemies.  - Ayaka Winterhoof

name: Devout Aurastone Hammer
rules: [Exhaust] -> You pay 1 less to play your next ally this turn and an additional 1 less for each heirloom counter on this equipment. ;;Stash (As this enters your resource row, you may have it enter face up. Immediately turn it face down.): Add an heirloom counter to target equipment you control.

name: Dignified Headmaster's Charge
rules: 2, [Exhaust] -> Draw a card, then draw another card for each heirloom counter on this equipment. ;;Stash (As this enters your resource row, you may have it enter face up. Immediately turn it face down.): Add an heirloom counter to target equipment you control.

name: Discerning Eye of the Beast
rules: 3, Put this equipment into its owner's hand -> Draw a card. ;;Stash (As this enters your resource row, you may have it enter face up. Immediately turn it face down.): Add an heirloom counter to target equipment you control.

name: Dread Pirate Ring
rules: On your turn: 2, Put this equipment into its owner's hand -> Put a 1 [Melee] / 1 [Health] Dread Pirate ally token named Bob into play. ;;Stash (As this enters your resource row, you may have it enter face up. Immediately turn it face down.): Add an heirloom counter to target equipment you control.

name: Etched Dragonbone Girdle
rules: [Exhaust], Destroy a Dragonkin you control -> Draw two cards.
flavour: The tortured soul of Sindragosa may finally be laid to rest. - Haedis

name: Grim Campfire
rules: When an opposing ally is destroyed, add a fuel counter to this equipment. At the end of your turn, your hero may heal 1 damage from each friendly hero and ally for each fuel counter.

name: Gutbuster
rules: When you deal fatal damage to an ally with this equipment, ready your hero, this equipment, and up to two resources you control.
flavour: Ugh, I got abomination on me. - Malaxia Buzzwhirl

name: Hersir's Greatspear
rules: When an ally enters play under your control, your hero may deal 1 nature damage to target hero or ally.

name: Lockjaw
rules: Once per turn: 2 -> Your hero heals 2 damage from target hero or ally.

name: Polished Breastplate of Valor
rules: 3 -> Add a +1 [DEF] counter to target armor you control. ;;Stash (As this enters your resource row, you may have it enter face up. Immediately turn it face down.): Add a +1 ATK counter to target weapon you control.

name: Prized Beastmaster's Mantle
rules: Non-[Horde], non-[Alliance] allies you control have +3 [Health]. ;;Stash (As this enters your resource row, you may have it enter face up. Immediately turn it face down.): Your hero heals 3 damage from target non-[Horde], non-[Alliance] ally you control.;(received errata)

name: Ramaladni's Blade of Culling
rules: Opposing heroes and allies have Protector.
flavour: Honor, young heroes... no matter how dire the battle... never forsake it! - High Overlord Saurfang

name: Repurposed Lava Dredger
rules: 3, [Exhaust] -> Reveal the top card of your deck and an additional card for each heirloom counter on this equipent. Place each revealed card into your resource row exhausted as an additional resource. ;;Stash (As this enters your resource row, you may have it enter face up. Immediately turn it face down.): Add an heirloom counter to target equipment you control.

name: Robe of the Waking Nightmare
rules: Dragonkin you control have +1 / +1.
flavour: Ysera grants me the favor to lay these foul creatures to rest! - Valithria Dreamwalker

name: Skinned Whelp Shoulders
rules: Your hero has Assault 2 for each Dragonkin you control.
flavour: Even the Scourge know the strength that lies within even the smallest scale of a dragonkin. - Arturius Hathrow

name: Stained Shadowcraft Tunic
rules: [Exhaust] -> Target hero or ally has Stealth this turn. ;;Stash (As this enters your resource row, you may have it enter face up. Immediately turn it face down.): Target hero or ally has Stealth this turn.

name: Stakethrower
rules: This equipment enters play with a stake counter. Long-Range (When you strike with this weapon on your turn, defenders deal no combat damage to the attacker.) Remove a stake counter -> This weapon has +3 ATK this combat.

name: Swift Hand of Justice
rules: 2, Put this equipment into its owner's hand -> Target ally has Ferocity this turn. ;;Stash (As this enters your resource row, you may have it enter face up. Immediately turn it face down.): Add an heirloom counter to target equipment you control.

name: Tattered Dreadmist Mantle
rules: If this equipment would prevent magical damage, it prevents that much +3 instead. ;;Stash (As this enters your resource row, you may have it enter face up. Immediately turn it face down.): The next time target hero or ally would be dealt magical damage this turn, prevent it.

name: Troggbane, Axe of the Frostborne King
rules: X -> This equipment has +X ATK this turn.
flavour: I'll make'm answer for everything he's done. - Muradin Bronzebeard

name: Venerable Mass of McGowan
rules: While your hero is attacking an ally, this equipment has +2 ATK for each heriloom counter on it. ;;Stash (As this enters your resource row, you may have it enter face up. Immediately turn it face down.): Add an heirloom counter to target equipment you control.

name: Wand of Ruby Claret
rules: When this equipment enters play, you may put target ability from your graveyard on top of your deck.

name: Warmace of Menethil
rules: When damage is dealt with this equipment, draw a card.
flavour: Remember, our line has always ruled with wisdom and strength. - Terenas Menethil II

name: Wyrmwing Treads
rules: 1, Exhaust a Dragonkin you control -> Ready target exhausted ally.
flavour: A flaw of mortality... - Sindragosa

name: Amaria Kelsur
rules: FRONT: 4 -> Flip Amaria. BACK: Opposing allies have -1 ATK while in combat with Amaria.
flavour: Deathwing and his brood will soon regret their brash attempts to assault us from the air.

name: Arturius Hathrow
rules: FRONT: 3 -> Flip Arturius. BACK: When Arturius heals damage for the first time each turn, he may deal 1 nature damage to target hero or ally.
flavour: The night elves have shown me just how empowering Cenarius can be.

name: Ayaka Winterhoof
rules: FRONT: 4 -> Flip Ayaka. BACK: When Ayaka deals 1 or more damage, she heals 1 damage from herself.
flavour: I have already glimpsed the afterlife, and now you shall see it for yourself.

name: Bragvi Stormstein
rules: FRONT: 4 -> Flip Bragvi. BACK: When an opposing hero is dealt nature ([Nature]) damage, Bragvi may deal 1 nature damage to target ally.
flavour: The elements are in turmoil. It is up to those of us who can hear their whispers to guide those who cannot.

name: Caleb Pavish
rules: FRONT: 2 -> Flip Caleb.;;BACK: At the start of your turn, Caleb deals 1 nature damage to target hero.
flavour: Sylvanas and her putrid Forsaken will pay for their arrogance, I promise you that.

name: Grizlik Sparkhex
rules: FRONT: 2 -> Flip Grizlik. BACK: You can control an additional Pet.
flavour: Harry it up, Jhuunash! We don't have time for this!

name: Haedis
rules: FRONT: 5 -> Flip Haedis. BACK: If Haedis would deal damage, he deals that much +1 instead.
flavour: Even those who once served the Light can succumb to the will of the dead.

name: Jaenel
rules: FRONT: 4 -> Flip Jaenel. BACK: Assault 1 (Jaenel has +1 ATK on your turn.)
flavour: One threat falls, and another rises; the work of the Light is without pause.

name: Jai Dawnsteel
rules: FRONT: 3 -> Flip Jai. BACK: Weapons you control have +1 ATK.
flavour: Underestimate the martial strength of the sin'dorei at your own risk.

name: Jumo'zin
rules: FRONT: 4 -> Flip Jumo'zin. BACK: When Jumo'zin is dealt combat damage while defending, he deals 1 nature damage to the source of that damage.
flavour: Da Darkspear have reclaimed da Echo Isles, and we gonna do whatever it takes to keep dem as our own.

name: Kadus Frosthand
rules: FRONT: 6 -> Flip Kadus. BACK: [Exhaust] -> Target ally can't attack this turn.
flavour: Watch me closely, lad. With one hand I can freeze our enemies in their tracks, and with the other, I can keep my mug of ale frostly.

name: Malaxia Wizwhirl
rules: FRONT: 2 -> Flip Malaxia. BACK: When an opposing ally is dealt [Nature] damage, Malaxia may deal 1 nature damage to target hero.
flavour: These totemic contraptions sure do pack quite the punch.

name: Peter Hottelet
rules: FRONT: 4 -> Flip Peter. BACK: When you strike with a Melee weapon, you may add a +1 ATK counter to it.
flavour: I don't mind if my skull ends up on a shelf as long as it's got my name on it.

name: Rekwa Proudhorn
rules: FRONT: 2 -> Flip Rekwa. BACK: Damage that Rekwa and allies you control would deal is unpreventable.
flavour: The Destroyer has returned, and I have turned to the Sun for guidance.

name: Suvok Frozeneye
rules: FRONT: 4 -> Flip Suvok. BACK: At the start of your turn, Suvok deals 1 frost damage to target opposing ready ally.
flavour: Cower before the might of the Horde and the new Warchief, Garrosh Hellscream!

name: Tilly Fiddlelight
rules: FRONT: 3 -> Flip Tilly.;BACK: Each ally you control has Mend 1. (At the start of your turn, it may heal 1 damage from target hero or ally.)
flavour: The Light has choosen me to aid those in need.

name: Valerie Worfield
rules: FRONT: 3 -> Flip Valerie. BACK: Prevent the first 1 damage that would be dealt to Valerie each turn.
flavour: Death has numbed me to the outside world, but my fingers still long to touch cold steel once more.

name: Victor Baltus
rules: FRONT: 2 -> Flip Victor. BACK: Demons you control have +1 / +1.
flavour: I will shred your body, and then Sardok will shred your soul.

name: Vorix Zorbuzz
rules: FRONT: 3 -> Flip Vorix. BACK: If Vorix would deal melee damage, he deals that much nature damage +1 instead.
flavour: Like lambs to the slaughter.

name: Yuna Sunridge
rules: FRONT: 3 -> Flip Yuna.;;BACK: Mend 1 (At the start of your turn, Yuna may heal 1 damage from target hero or ally.)
flavour: The Earthmother has taught me much, and now I look to the Sun to teach me furtger.

name: Gilneas
rules: 4 -> Worgen you control have Assault 2 this turn.
flavour: Protected behind Greymane's Wall since the end of the Second War, the kingdom of Gilneas seeks to rejoin the Aliance.

name: Lost Isles
rules: 1, [Exhaust] -> Target Goblin you control has Assault 1 this turn for each equipment you control.
flavour: After fleeing Kezan during the cataclysm, members of the Bilgewater Cartel found themselves shipwrecked here.

name: Alexstrasza the Life-Binder
rules: You pay X less to play Alexstrasza, where X is the combined ATK of allies you control. Assault 5 Allies you control can't be destroyed.
flavour: Life is my Aspect, dark one, and I, like all mothers, know both the pain and wonder that entails!

name: Ysera the Dreamer
rules:
You pay 1 less to play Ysera for each face-down resource you control.
Mend 3
At the start of your turn, you may draw a card.
flavour: I must seek answers from within the Emerald Dream.

name: A Matter of Time
rules: Pay 6 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw two cards. If you control ten or more resources, draw another two cards.
flavour: Temporal parasites - carrion that feed on the strands of time's altered flow - now infest the silos of Andorhal. - Chromie

name: Challenge to the Black Flight
rules: Pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card if a Dragonkin entered play this turn. Draw a card if a Dragonkin left play this turn.
flavour: Take Brogg's clan banner and travel east untill you see a cave like a dragon's mouth. - Brogg

name: Cleansing Witch Hill
rules: On your turn: Pay 4 to complete this quest.;Reward: Turn target resource face down. Draw a card.
flavour: The torch is ready. Plant it at the end of the dock and be prepared to face whatever comes forth. - Mordant Grimsby

name: Corrosion Prevention
rules: If a hero or ally you controlled dealt nature ([Nature]) damage this turn: Pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: Just look at this area! It's swarming with oozes. - Moxie Steelgrille

name: Counting Out Time
rules: Pay 4 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card. If you control ten or more resources, draw another two cards.
flavour: In exchange for those watches, I'll give you another item that, in the future, I suspect you'll find quite the use for. - Chromie

name: Crystals of Power
rules: Pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Reveal the top five cards of your deck. Put a revealed [Nature] card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.
flavour: What am I talking about? Why, the crystals, of course! - J.D. Collie

name: Finding the Source
rules: Pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Reveal the top five cards of your deck. Put a revealed quest into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.
flavour: The hot springs here are a source of mystery to me. Where does the heat come from? - Krakle

name: Leader of the Pack
rules: Worgen Hero Required; On your turn: Pay 6 to complete this quest.;Reward: Put four 1 [Melee] / 1 [Health] Mastiff ally tokens into play with Ferocity.
flavour: I'll have my men let loose our attack mastiffs to take her down. - Lord Godfrey

name: Locked Away
rules: You pay 4 less to complete this quest if you control a quest named The Key to Freedom. Pay 5 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: As you rattle the door, you hear a guttural moaning come from inside! Whatever is inside there, it certainly does not sound friendly.

name: Mystery Goo
rules: Pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Reveal the top five cards of your deck. Put a revealed ability into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.
flavour: The greenish substance inside the caukdron appears to be similar to what you found in the flask.

name: The Essence of Enmity
rules: Pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Reveal the top five cards of your deck. Put a revealed ally into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.
flavour: The creatures you seek swarn over the Den of Flame to the northwest and the Stonemaul Ruins to the north. - Brogg

name: The Grimtotem Weapon
rules: Pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Reveal the top five cards of your deck. Put a revealed equipment into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your deck.
flavour: I'll loan the totem to you if you agree to help me test it. - Apprentice Garion

name: The Key to Freedom
rules: Pay 4 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
reprinted: Class Starter Deck 2011 (Fall),Class Starter Deck 2011 (Spring),Champion Decks
flavour: The small brass key looks simple enough.

name: The Mighty U'cha
rules: On your turn: Pay 2 to complete this quest.;Reward: Put a 1 [Nature] / 1 [Health] Gorilla ally token named U'cha into play.
flavour: I call him U'cha, and he is one of the Earthmother;s greatest sons, of that you can be sure. - Torwa Pathfinder

name: The Torch of Retribution
rules: Pay 4 to complete this quest.;Reward: Target player shuffles his graveyard into his deck. Draw a card.
flavour: The torch must now be bound to its owner.

name: The Witch's Bane
rules: Pay 3 to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card for each five opposing face-down resources.
flavour: You should be able to identify it by its broad leaves and reddish central stalk. - Mordant Grimsby

name: Warchief's Revenge
rules: Goblin Hero Required; On your turn: For each ally you control, you may pay 1 to complete this quest.;Reward: Your hero deals 1 nature damage to target hero or ally for each 1 paid this way.
flavour: Allow me to channel your will through this child of Kezan. - Thrall

name: What's Haunting Witch Hill?
rules: Pay 2 and an additional 1 for each opposing face-up resource to complete this quest.;Reward: Draw a card.
flavour: Have you seen the ghosts and corpses shambling about Witch Hill? - Mordant Grimsby

name: Mottled Drake
rules: When you place a resource into your resource row face up, ready target Dragonkin ally you control. Your hero heals all damage from it. <i>(Mounts can't attack or be attacked.)

name: Landro's Lil' XT
rules: When this ally enters play, you may destroy target item. At the start of your turn, this ally deals 1 nature damage to each hero and ally.
flavour: I guess it doesn't bend that way!

name: Grim Campfire
rules: When an opposing ally is destroyed, add a fuel counter to this equipment. At the end of your turn, your hero may heal 1 damage from each friendly hero and ally for each fuel counter.

name: Ysera the Dreamer
rules:
You pay 1 less to play Ysera for each face-down resource you control.
Mend 3
At the start of your turn, you may draw a card.
flavour: I must seek answers from within the Emerald Dream.
